lom:description.lom:string: Blog on computer science and software engineering education from CrossTalk - The Journal of Defense Software Engineering. Excerpt: "It is our view that Computer Science (CS) education is neglecting basic skills, in particular in the areas of programming and formal methods. We consider that the general adoption of Java as a first programming language is in part responsible for this decline. We examine briefly the set of programming skills that should be part of every software professionalÂ’s repertoire."

lom:title.lom:string: Computer Science Education: Where Are the Software Engineers of Tomorrow?
